description.en: Lecture course and practices about principles and applications of Good Laboratory Practice (GLP), Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and ISO 17025. Application of the concepts of GLP/GMP as well as ISO 17025 in research, in ordinary laboratory work and in production. Comparison of the GLP/GMP and ISO 17025 quality concepts.
description.et: Loengukursus ja praktikum on GLP (Good Laboratory Practice), GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) ja ISO 17025 olemusest, kasutusvaldkondadest ja põhimõtetest, samuti GLP/GMP ja ISO 17025 põhimõtete kasutamisest uurimistöös, tavalaboris ning tootmises. GLP/GMP ja ISO 17025 kvaliteedimudelite võrdlus.

objectives.en: To give overview of principles and applications of Good Laboratory Practice (GLP), Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and ISO 17025. Application of the concepts of GLP/GMP as well as ISO 17025 in research, in ordinary laboratory work and in production. Comparison of the GLP/GMP and ISO 17025 quality concepts.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade GLP (Good Laboratory Practice), GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) ja ISO 17025 olemusest, kasutusvaldkondadest ja põhimõtetest, samuti GLP/GMP ja ISO 17025 põhimõtete kasutamisest uurimistöös, tavalaboris ning tootmises.

learning_outcomes.en: -- knows the principles and applications of Good Laboratory Practice (GLP), Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and ISO 17025.
learning_outcomes.et: -- tunneb GLP (Good Laboratory Practice), GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) ja ISO 17025 olemust, kasutusvaldkondi ja põhimõtteid

learning_outcomes.en: -- is able to apply the concepts of GLP/GMP as well as ISO 17025 in research, in ordinary laboratory work and in production.
learning_outcomes.et: -- tunneb GLP/GMP ja ISO 17025 põhimõtete kasutamisest uurimistöös, tavalaboris ning tootmises

learning_outcomes.en: -- knows the similarities and differences of the GLP/GMP and ISO 17025 quality concepts.
learning_outcomes.et: -- teab GLP/GMP ja ISO 17025 kvaliteedimudelite erinevusi.

description.et: The course ends with a written exam.

grade_preconditions.et: All students will be admitted to the exam.

grade_evaluation.et: The final score is formed on the basis of the exam

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
